The '''Israeli Tolkien Society''' ('''עמותת טולקין הישראלית''') is the [[Tolkien Societies|Tolkien society]] in Israel. 

==History==
The Israeli Tolkien Society was founded in April 2004 and holds regular meetings every month. The society maintained a Tolkien Wiki in Hebrew which however hasn't been updated since 2019.

In 2023 this society lists activities on its new website.
